job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies modifying or enhancing an existing AI system, which falls under the broader scope of model improvement and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions 'AI model fine-tuning sessions,' which is a core component of adapting and improving AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are part of the software development lifecycle, especially when integrating new technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This describes the act of combining different components (human expertise, AI capabilities) into a functional system, which is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on the application and improvement of existing AI systems in a customer support context, rather than the core development of AI models. While there's mention of 'fine-tuning' and 'prototyping AI tools', it lacks the depth and emphasis on algorithm development or core AI/ML model building required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. The primary function appears to be using AI to enhance customer resolutions, which leans towards AI-assisted workflows rather than deep AI engineering.
